titles: The condemnation of VVhig and Tory I am neither Whig nor Tory, but a subject truly loyal, as you'll see by what's before yee; who still does pray for the royal C.R.
publisher: printed for R.W. in the year,
notes: Verse - "Sirs, What's the matter? 's all the World grown mad?".
Reproduction of the originals in: British Library; Henry E. Huntington Library.
